title: China's Green Technology is a bunch of BS!
description:
China's push to make everyone think they're "green" and "clean" so that they can pollute more behind the scenes probably fooled you! Let's talk about the three successful lies the CCP has managed to convince most of the world are actually true...

Join us for our weekly live show: https://www.youtube.com/c/ADVPodcasts

Watch Stay Awesome, China! here:
https://youtu.be/mSie5A3LWgI
